issue.title: [CF 1462] Condition tracking for "Unit Range" Changed
issue.body:
Hi there,

 

the unit range of 6yds changed from precise to imprecise. I wanted to ask if this is just an indication error, a change or just my personal display bug. Is it intended to change the range from precise to imprecise for 6 yds?But instead the range meter for 7 yrds changed from imprecise to precise. Maybe I´m a bit outdated the last time i noticed it.

 

Greetings


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1462 | Raw

comments.body:
That condition uses https://www.wowace.com/projects/librangecheck-2-0. If that has changed, its because LRC changed the data it uses and no longer includes any spell/item that it can use to check 6 yard ranges.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
